description.narrative: AusAID's support assists implementing the Australia-Tonga Partnership for Development Priority Outcome 1: a more efficient and effective public sector. The initiative includes the design of the management arrangements for assistance to the economic and public sector management sector in consultation with Government of Tonga (GoT) and key donors, in particular the ADB. AusAID funding will support the GoT planning and delivery will be through Cash Grants using GoT financial systems managed by the Ministry of Finance and National Planning (MoFNP). The assistance under this spending proposal will assist in improving public financial management and government monitoring and reporting, and is a key element in improving the partner government systems to further the Paris/Accra agenda/Cairns Compact. The total value of this initiative is $4.2 million over 5 years, starting 2008-09.
